title: (x) Teen Vogue Handbook Script Font / bold connected angular ribbon-like script - Loupot {Florian}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235517im_/http:/typophile.com/files/teen-vogue-handbook-860_4517.jpg)

"the" or "An Insider's Guide to Careers in Fashion"
author: rlhoffman10

comments.content: I’ll move this thread to the appropriate place, the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235517/http:/typophile.com/typeid).
Does anyone know where to get this font for free?

No, it’s a commercial font; you need to license it. Read about [the value of type](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429235517/http:/www.letterror.com/content/value/index.html).  
Or do your own: duct tape is even more affordable than fonts.
